body.title: Pretty format
body.elms:
{: .-prime}

```bash
git log --pretty="format:%H"
```

See the next tables on format variables.

body.title: Hash
body.elms:
#### Commit

| Variable | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `%H` | commit hash |
| `%h` | (abbrev) commit hash |

#### Tree

| Variable | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `%T` | tree hash |
| `%t` | (abbrev) tree hash |

#### Parent

| Variable | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `%P` | parent hash |
| `%p` | (abbrev) parent hash |

body.title: Commit
body.elms:
| Variable | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `%s` | commit subject |
| `%f` | commit subject, filename style |
| `%b` | commit body |
| --- | --- |
| `%d` | ref names |
| `%e` | encoding |

body.title: Author
body.elms:
#### Name

| Variable | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `%an` | author |
| `%aN` | author, respecting mailmap |

#### Email

| Variable | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `%ae` | author email |
| `%aE` | author email, respecting mailmap |

#### Date

| Variable | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `%aD` | author date (rfc2882) |
| `%ar` | author date (relative) |
| `%at` | author date (unix timestamp) |
| `%ai` | author date (iso8601) |

body.title: Committer
body.elms:
#### Name

| Variable | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `%cn` | committer name |
| `%cN` | committer name, respecting mailmap |

#### Email

| Variable | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `%ce` | committer email |
| `%cE` | committer email, respecting mailmap |

#### Date

| Variable | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `%cD` | committer date (rfc2882) |
| `%cr` | committer date (relative) |
| `%ct` | committer date (unix timestamp) |
| `%ci` | committer date (iso8601) |
